name: react-url-query
description: A library for managing state through query parameters in the URL in React. Works well with or without Redux and React Router.

scripts.lint: npm run lint:src && npm run lint:examples
scripts.check:src: npm run lint:src && npm run test
scripts.check:examples: npm run build:examples && npm run lint:examples && npm run test:examples
scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-url-query.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-url-query.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run check:src && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g pbeshai/react-url-query
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:pbeshai/react-url-query gh-pages --force

author: Peter Beshai <peter.beshai@gmail.com> (https://github.com/pbeshai)
